QueryResult.text: select o.object_id doc_type_id, count(o.pk_id) id from bpm_run_objects o, bpm_run_processes p where o.object_type_code='document' and o.table_name='BPM_RUN_PROCESSES' and o.pk_id = p.id and p.status_code != 'BPM_PIS_DONE' and p.status_code != 'BPM_PIS_ABORTED' group by o.object_id
